tool_description: Send messages to Discord channels with automatic message splitting and sanitization

available_commands.description: Send message to Discord channel (uses last active channel if not specified)
Get recent conversation context from Discord (automatic - no manual calls needed)

tool_usage_examples: Use chat.send_message to respond to Discord messages
Automatically splits long messages into multiple sends
Sanitizes @everyone and @here mentions to prevent spam
Tracks conversation context for natural responses
Keep Discord messages conversational and engaging
proactive_triggers: When users send messages in allowed Discord channels
When mentioned with @bot in a message
When replying to previous bot messages
When users ask questions or request help
When conversation naturally calls for a response

metadata.notes: Requires Discord bot token and proper permissions. Supports channel/guild restrictions, message callbacks, and context tracking. GUI component provides full configuration and monitoring.
